Trustee_1.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1.content: Hiroshi Tanaka has maintained a solid reputation as a trustee by adhering to the proposed allocation plan and executing the profit distribution effectively. He retained 30% of the profits while ensuring the investor received their rightful share without discrepancies, showcasing reliability, professionalism, and a strategic approach that prioritizes mutual benefit. This successful transaction enhances his appeal for attracting future investments, reflecting his trustworthiness, pro-sociality, and competence.

Investor_13.name: Emma Dubois
Investor_13.content: Emma Dubois has shown willingness to engage in collaborative investment opportunities, indicating a reasonable and trusting nature. However, due to the absence of prior history, her reputation as an investor remains uncertain. Her acceptance of the allocation plan and participation in this investment suggest potential for positive interactions if she continues to honor agreements and fairly share profits in future engagements.
